projectGridLines.stationName: Grasim Industries Ltd - Pulp & Fibre Business - Advanced Analytics, Harihar
projectGridLines.title: Advanced Analytics Use case deployment in Manufacturing
projectGridLines.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Understand the manufacturing process along with lead and lag indicators
  • Map these corelations along with the process flow. 
  • Plan implementation of various advanced analytics soft sensors for predicting quality at various stages of production
  • Advanced analytics solutions through image/video analytics
  • Collaborate with IT/partner to facilitate changes / issue resolution and implementation at scale etc. 


Learning Opportunities:

  • Gain hands-on experience of Advanced Analytics tools
  • Acquire knowledge focused on production process and operations
  • Obtain a high-level understanding of the classification, training and deployment of analytics
  • Learn about the implementation of AI using Video Analytics at the grassroots level.


Requirements:

  • AI/ML
  • Strong communication and liaison skills.
  • Keen interest in learning about AI and Video Analytics
